page.title: 15Peters Green
page.content: Peters Green is a small village. There are 40 houses they are mostly bungalows. There is a village hall, it was built in 1929. There is a public house with a play park. On the green is the remains of an old village pond. There is a garage and a telephone box. We found a tree held up by a prop. Next to the bus shelter is a post box and at the back of the houses is a black water tower. Next to this are some allotments. There is a church and it was built in 1889. On a plaque above the church door it says 'Perry Green Church.' Around the village are lots of woods and fields.
